name: Aphonia
description:
When boredom takes over, any idea can be interesting. At least that's what your friends thought when they decided to go wandering into a mysterious silent retreat in the woods near town.  You could use some time alone for meditading and going on an instrospective experience, after all, there's no talking, no gesturing, and no escape.

In Aphonia, your goal is to explore and investigate the location, so that you can understand what is happenning at the place and get you and your friends out of it. The game's mechanics consist on walking and interacting with clues and objects to make progress throughout the story. The controls are as followed:

-WASD:  Walk;
-F: Interact;
-Ctrl: Crouch;
-Mouse: Look around.
